script:
# script "lisp"
# background %(wayback_background)s
# bgmfile "bgm255" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# fadein "black" 0.5
# textflame 0 0
# face %(unit_a)s "usual"
@
帰り道－

# fadein "white" 0.5
# se "SE_0735"
# bgm "stop"
# waitandnext 2
@
…………

# fadein "white" 0.5
# se "SE_0735"
# waitandnext 2
@
…………

@
ふと、
傍らを歩く彼女が足を止めた…

# bgmfile "bgm255" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# textflame 1 1
# voice 5003 "yatanokagami_0001"
@八咫鏡
お主…
その…ちょっとよいか？

# face %(unit_a)s "sad"
# voice 5003 "yatanokagami_0002"
@八咫鏡
えっとだな…
試すみたいになってしまうのじゃが…

# face %(unit_a)s "smile"
@八咫鏡
わらわのこと…
どれだけ知っておるか
クイズを出してもいいか？

# face %(unit_a)s "usual"
# voice 5003 "yatanokagami_0036"
@八咫鏡
ふむ…いくぞよ？

@八咫鏡
まぁ、これはサービス問題じゃ
わらわの誕生日を言うてみよ♪

# se "SE_0734"
# select "7月7日" "select_label_wrong1" "6月6日" "select_label_wrong2" "8月8日" "select_label_correct"
まぁ、これはサービス問題じゃ
わらわの誕生日を言うてみよ♪

# label "select_label_wrong1"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_wrong2"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_correct"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# sestop "SE_0734"
# fadeout "black" 1.2
# waitandnext 2
